name: Spinach, Clementine and Pomegranate Salad
description: A delightful winter salad packed with Vitamins and minerals.

ingredients.name: sliced almonds, hazelnuts or sunflower seeds

preparation: Whisk together Balsamic Vinaigrette in a medium mixing bowl.
Add spinach leaves and gently toss to coat.
Sprinkle with pomegranate seeds, nuts and clementines. Serve immediately.
tips: For easy, mess-free, pomegranate seeds, score pomegranate skin into quarters. Place in a bowl of water and break open. Seeds will sink to the bottom and segments will float to the top. Scoop away pulp, drain and enjoy.

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: Fresh, bright & bold blend of Mediterranean herbs with notes of garlic & rosemary. Our most versatile dressing.
